title: Mourning Sampler
artistDisplayName:
Made by members of the Smith and Humphreys families at Miss Field’s School 
Boston, Massachusetts, United States
medium: Linen, plain weave; embroidered with silk floss in tent, cross, long and a mixture of stem, whip and couching stitches
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Barbara Notz Hines Memorial Fund; Elizabeth M. Schultz Endowment
